@Aldyn Your insecurities are shown through this hentai. And that's my opinion I didnt say anything about a source chump. Your whole point is irrelevant. People arent disliking the black-haired girl because she is a prostitute. They are disliking her because she is a major bitch about it and treats people like trash. On the contrary the gyaru is honest about her work and tries to help the MC. She has some dignity. Their characters are totally different. If you cant distinguish between a story's characters then you need to read more doujins and more fictions in general. The only thing that I kinda I agree with you is that it's not wholesome. But it still is good and satisfying.

@NeoArmstrong "Most of the time people hate what reminds them of themselves" — Source: dude, trust me. Stop trying to read what people's lives are behind the screen, weirdo. Looks like you're the one who identifies with the MC here. I can throw that one back at you and say that people often rationalize behaviors that they themselves are guilty of, like staring at people in public and not taking showers. Source? Same as yours. Now what? Honestly, I don't care if you think this is "passable" writing. It just shows that you haven't read enough hentai yet, and that's fine. My whole point was how this isn't wholesome and people are hypocrites for liking the gyaru even though they dislike the train girl for being a prostitute. It was never about enjoying this mediocre manga. It was about pushing it to the popular section and moaning "sO wHoLeSoMe" while saying stuff that is just asinine. Feel free to disagree, because I already said what I had to say.

@Aldyn Most of the time people hate what reminds them of themselves. You probably hate the MC that much because he is a reflection of yourself. And that's really sad. I dont believe that this is some god-tier writing hentai. I do believe tho that when you compare it to other similar doujins its passable. It's actually moving the "plot" to a different direction. The standards for hentai stories arent that high. Considering those said standards this hentai-writing is above th average. It's not my fault that your saltiness is blinding you.

@NeoArmstrong You're actually delusional. How am I putting myself in MC's place when I'm actively wishing for him to get cucked? Ever heard of reading stuff as an uninvolved third party? And I'll repeat once again that the MC isn't trying to change shit. Normal people get haircuts because they're not gross, not because they were coerced into it, and I'm pretty sure his appearance is a very low priority compared to his weirdo behavior that he ultimately didn't change. And yes, this is hentai, which is precisely the reason why the girl doesn't feel like dying after getting confessed to like this, but that doesn't mean we can't judge this goofy goober of an MC. People have different ways of engaging with fictional media. And no one is offended here. I fap to shit that is much more "offensive" than this. Being critical of trash writing isn't being offended, and trash writing is precisely one of the things that this artist is known for.
